amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding to the Hazardous Substance Superfund by $13,060,000 and reduce funding for Payments In Lieu of Taxes by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-683 to add $13,060,000 to the Hazardous Substance Superfund (equal to President's Budget request) and reduces Payments In Lieu of Taxes by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 282 (Roll no. 420).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 282 (Roll no. 420).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Norcross.
